table.caption: Marks of the Donjon
rows: The character's vision is limited to a 5-foot-wide line pointing in a single direction.
The character gets nauseous near windows or doorways. If the character moves through such a threshold, the character has disadvantage on saving throws for 1 minute.
The character is plagued by nightmares of metal constructs.
The character is disoriented by wide-open spaces and has no sense of direction outdoors.
While in sunlight, the character has disadvantage on attack rolls.
